channel.title: Legit chance to win 200k OS gold
channel.description:
I will give 200k to a person who go into full detail on how to make peanut butter jelly sammiches. (silab needs to learn)
So... requirements :
1)Every step must be numbered 2)You must list every step 3)Don't forget anything
Have fun and good luck!

Geez, just pick a random winner out of the ones that have posted. Worst quiz.[/quote]
Haha, no i posted. I had ‘ok, i got this’ at the start, a mod would be able to find it.

It isn’t that hard to pick, mate.

item.title: Legit chance to win 200k OS gold
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

  1. Wash hands - VERY FUCKING IMPORTANT. We are serving food, not cleaning a toilet
  2. Get bread - Be alpha - sell by date doesn’t give a shit about you so why should you give a shit about it?
  3. Whack dick out - Missing this step may lead to no jelly on your sammich.
  4. Cum over half the bread - If you get it on both sides you’re a GIMP. 1 SIDE MOTHERFUCKER. BECAUSE I FUCKING SAID SO THATS WHY.
  5. Get some eggs and smash the fuck out of them on the floor - This step is vital if you wish to feel good before eating the sandwich
  6. Take off all your clothes and roll in the eggs - optional, but may in the long run promote healtier skin (subject to the individual)
  7. Petrol up those eggs - nobody likes to clean shit up, so just kill it with fire
  8. Blend some peanuts - penut butter in a jar is OVERRATED. You’d best fire your blender up and stop crying like a BITCH. Fucking be a man.
  9. Miss step 9 - ALPHA I SAID YOU DICK.
  10. add the blended penut butter. BE MANLY WHILE DOING IT THOUGH. Suggest adding the peauts while naked.
  11. Kill yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Legit chance to win 200k OS gold
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:509698”]Hey Silab, just stop posting and go make me a sammuch. I don’t even know how many times I need to say it to get it through your female-idiocy earmuffs, I didn’t make a cent from ProjectRS06 for the hundreds of hours I put into it, and I will gladly prove it to you in any way you see fit if you want me to. Maybe you just can’t find a logical reason to be such a bitch if you can’t justify it by ‘he was doing it for the money’, but I’m sure if you really put your tiny brain to it you could come up with some other bullshit excuse. As for this contest, I don’t even want the money, I don’t play anymore, I just felt like making a post just for you when I saw the OP.
Lots of love,
David[/quote]

Rep ++
